results.description:
Prepare to use Dragon Slash. While channeling, you drain flow. Each interval increases the charge level of Dragon Slash.
This skill is canceled if you move.
name: Dragon Trigger
Drachen-Auslöser
Détente du dragon
Activación dracónica

results.description: Armament. Your next few explosion attacks deal more damage. Using this skill while you already have stacks of Overcharged Cartridges causes you to use Detonate Cartridges instead.

facts.description: Your explosions do more damage.

name: Overcharged Cartridges
Überladene Patronen
Cartouches surchargées
Cartuchos sobrecargados

results.description: Put your gunsaber away and return to your normal weapon set. Changes to your weapon recharge rate affect this skill.
name: Sheathe Gunsaber

results.description: Chain. Chop your foe.
name: Chop
Hacken
Couper
Cortar

results.description: Fire all the barrels in your hand cannon to deal damage to foes in front of you. This skill consumes all your ammo when fired and pushes you back slightly based on the amount of ammo expended.
name: Dragon's Roar
Drachengebrüll
Rugissement du dragon
Rugido de dragón

results.description: After a delay, deliver a circular attack to foes around you. Increases flow rate if it hits.

facts.description: Gain flow per second.

name: Unseen Sword
Ungesehenes Schwert
Épée invisible
Espada oculta

results.description: Quickly step forward to strike your foe while reloading your gun. Restores ammo to skill 5.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.
Block the next incoming attack; stacks duration.

name: Gunstinger
Ladeprügel
Fine gâchette
Culatazo

results.description: Spin around and attack all nearby foes, applying vulnerability each hit. Gain fury for each foe hit.

facts.description: Critical chance increased; stacks duration.
Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

name: Cyclone Axe
Zyklonaxt
Hache cyclone
Hacha ciclón

results.description: Throw an axe that cripples foes, dealing bonus damage at lower health thresholds.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

name: Throw Axe
Axt werfen
Jet de hache
Lanzar hacha

results.description: Chain. Chop your foe twice.
name: Double Chop
Doppelhacker
Double coupe
Corte doble

results.description: Unsheathe your gunsaber to gain new skills. Changes to your weapon recharge rate affect this skill.
name: Unsheathe Gunsaber

results.description: Armament. Reload ammo on all of your bladesworn skills. Your next Dragon Trigger generates more charges per interval.

facts.description: Your next Dragon Trigger charges more quickly.

name: Tactical Reload
Taktisches Nachladen
Rechargement tactique
Recarga táctica

results.description: Deliver three final chops to your foe.
name: Triple Chop

Corte triple

results.description: Chain. Bash your foe.

results.description: Chain. Bash your foe again.
name: Hammer Bash

Coup de marteau

results.description: Smash the ground and damage nearby foes.
name: Hammer Smash

Fracas de marteau
Aplastamiento con martillo

results.description:
Weaken your foe with a fierce blow, dealing increased damage when striking a controlled or defiant foe.
Controls include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

facts.text: Damage to Controlled or Defiant Foes
Damage to Controlled or Defiant Foes

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.

name: Fierce Blow
Erbitterter Schlag
Coup féroce
Impacto feroz

results.description: Smash the ground and send out a crippling wave.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

name: Hammer Shock
Hammerschock
Impact de marteau
Choque de martillo

results.description: Push back nearby foes with a staggering blow.
name: Staggering Blow
Umwerfender Schlag
Coup déséquilibrant
Impacto abrumador

results.description:
Knock down your foe. Weakened foes stay knocked down longer. Recharges Fierce Blow if you control a foe with this ability.
<c=reminder>Recharges Fierce Blow if striking a target with a defiance bar.</c>
name: Backbreaker
Rückenbrecher
Brise-échine
Rompespaldas

results.description: Expends your remaining charges by throwing them at the ground in front of you, launching and damaging foes. Explosion radius increases based on the number of charges spent.
name: Detonate Cartridges
Patronen detonieren
Détonation de cartouches
Detonar cartuchos

results.description: Physical. Remove conditions and heal yourself.
name: Mending
Genesung
Rétablissement
Sanación

results.description: Shout. Heal yourself and regain all adrenaline. Nearby allies gain endurance.
name: "To the Limit!"
"Bis ans Äußerste!"
"Jusqu'au bout !"
"¡Al límite!"

results.description: Banner. Place a banner that damages and applies conditions to foes on initial placement, then pulses additional boons to you and nearby allies afterward.

Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

results.description: Banner. Place a banner that grants boons and superspeed and breaks stuns on initial placement, then pulses boons to you and nearby allies afterward.

facts.description: Movement speed is greatly increased. Maximum duration: 10s
Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.
Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.
